metadata.name: Night Light with Photoresistor
metadata.description: Automatic LED night light that turns on when ambient light is low, using a photoresistor voltage divider for light sensing.

wires.description: Power supply to photoresistor. Connects 3.3V to one side of the voltage divider.
Analog input from voltage divider junction. Reads the variable voltage between photoresistor and 10kΩ resistor to measure light level.
Ground connection for voltage divider. Completes the ground path for the 10kΩ resistor in the light sensor circuit.
GPIO control signal for LED. When set HIGH, provides current through the current-limiting resistor to the LED.
Ground connection for LED cathode. Completes the current path for the LED circuit.
